application.title: Laskut

collections.name: invoice_items
collections.before_update_code: if(!modifier.$set) return; var quantity = modifier.$set.quantity || doc.quantity; var price = modifier.$set.price || doc.price; modifier.$set.amount = quantity * price;
collections.after_insert_code: var sum = 0; InvoiceItems.find({ invoiceId: doc.invoiceId }).map(function(item) { sum += item.amount; }); Invoices.update({ _id: doc.invoiceId }, { $set: { totalAmount: sum }});
collections.after_update_code: var sum = 0; InvoiceItems.find({ invoiceId: doc.invoiceId }).map(function(item) { sum += item.amount; }); Invoices.update({ _id: doc.invoiceId }, { $set: { totalAmount: sum }});
collections.after_remove_code: var sum = 0; InvoiceItems.find({ invoiceId: doc.invoiceId }).map(function(item) { sum += item.amount; }); Invoices.update({ _id: doc.invoiceId }, { $set: { totalAmount: sum }});

options.transform: function(doc) { var sum = 0; Invoices.find({ customerId: doc._id }).map(function(item) { if(item.totalAmount) sum += item.totalAmount; }); doc.totalAmount = sum; return doc; }
function(doc) { var sum = 0; Invoices.find({ customerId: doc._id }).map(function(item) { sum += item.totalAmount; }); doc.totalAmount = sum; return doc; }

components.helpers_code: 'nextInvoiceNumber': function() { var max = 0; var invoiceNumbers = Invoices.find({}, { fields: { invoiceNumber: 1 }}).fetch(); _.each(invoiceNumbers, function(doc) { var intNum = parseInt(doc.invoiceNumber); if(!isNaN(intNum) && intNum > max) max = intNum; }); return max + 1; }
